title: ‘Mark is Really Upset and Angry’: Cavendish Relegated in One of His Last Sprints in Tour de France Career
content:
'Mark is really upset and angry about the decision:' Race jury hands down controversial relegation to record-man in what could be one of Cavendish's final sprints in his storied Tour de France career.

Read the full article at ‘Mark is Really Upset and Angry’: Cavendish Relegated in One of His Last Sprints in Tour de France Career on Velo.
author: ahood
